CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceUom__c) = 'Year',
IF(Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__OptionId__c != null,
IF( Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.APTS_Alternate_Quantity_Display__c = TRUE, IF(Floor(Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__BasePrice__c / 4) - 0.01 > Apttus_Billing__Amount__c, "Prorated", "25%") ,IF(BEGINS(TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),'.'),'0'+TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c))),
IF( Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APTS_Alternate_Quantity_Display__c = TRUE, IF(Floor(Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__BasePrice__c / 4) - 0.01 > Apttus_Billing__Amount__c, "Prorated", "25%") ,IF(BEGINS(TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),'.'),'0'+TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c)))),
IF(TEXT(Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceUom__c) = 'Month',
IF(Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__OptionId__c != null,
IF( Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.APTS_Alternate_Quantity_Display__c = TRUE, IF(Floor(Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__BasePrice__c) != Apttus_Billing__Amount__c, "Prorated", "1") ,IF(BEGINS(TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),'.'),'0'+TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c))),
IF( Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APTS_Alternate_Quantity_Display__c = TRUE, IF(Floor(Apttus_Billing__AssetLineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__BasePrice__c) != Apttus_Billing__Amount__c, "Prorated", "1") ,IF(BEGINS(TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),'.'),'0'+TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c)))),
IF(BEGINS(TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),'.'),'0'+TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c),TEXT(APTS_Report_Quantity__c))))
CustomField.label: Report - Alternate Quatity
